email_body: This file contains graphs illustrating volumes by tenor by product type on a quarterly basis since Q499. For example, daily volume for Natural Gas Financial Swaps during this quarter has been 25 BCF(25,000 contracts) for 1 month trades, 20 BCF (20,000 contracts) for greater than 1 month trades, and 50 BCF (5,000 contracts) for less than 1 month trades. Please call with questions. Phillip Allen 713-853-7041 -----Original Message----- From: Webb, Jay Sent: Sunday, December 02, 2001 6:19 PM To: Allen, Phillip K. Subject: charts
